title: Add entry point-based policy discovery to mettagrid
description:
The policy discovery in mettagrid/python/src/mettagrid/policy/loader.py only searches hardcoded packages (mettagrid.policy, metta.agent.policy, cogames.policy). External policies like metta_spider can't register short names.

Would need to add entry point support like `[project.entry-points."mettagrid.policies"]` so external packages can register policies via pyproject.toml.
